document_data.caption: A dao conjuring a blast of sandspray.
document_data.name: Sandspray
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sandspray''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects:
With this spell the caster caused pillar of [[sand]] to explode upward beneath a target. The pillar rose to {{SI|30|ft}} high, blinding the target for several minutes and causing abrasive damage based on the magical might of the caster.

This spell could only be cast in an area of plentiful sand.
document_data.Components: This spell required sand to cast.
